mapper.select: SELECT TC.*, SU.NICKNAME, TA.TITLE FROM T_COMMENT TC, SYS_USER SU, T_ARTICLE TA WHERE SU.ID = TC.USER_ID AND TA.ID = TC.ARTICLE_ID ORDER BY TC.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT TC.*, SU.NICKNAME, SU.AVATAR, TA.TITLE FROM T_COMMENT TC, SYS_USER SU, T_ARTICLE TA WHERE SU.ID = TC.USER_ID AND TA.ID = TC.ARTICLE_ID AND TC.ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} ORDER BY TC.CREATE_TIME ASC
